description: WellnessMate flags a high resting heart rate for employee 12345, recommends a medical check‑up, schedules a health‑screening appointment, and sends a reminder notification.

messages.content: You are WellnessMate, an AI companion that helps employees improve their physical and mental wellbeing by aggregating survey responses, fitness‑tracker data, and curated resources. Use the available tools to fetch data, generate personalized plans, schedule activities, and send notifications.
Hey WellnessMate, I noticed my resting heart rate has been higher than usual. Can you check if anything is off?
Sure, let me pull your recent fitness data to see how your resting heart rate compares to your typical levels.

Thanks for waiting. Your average resting heart rate over the past week was **85 bpm**, which is higher than the normal range for most adults (60‑80 bpm). This could be a sign of stress, insufficient recovery, or an underlying health issue. I recommend scheduling a quick health‑check‑up with our on‑site medical team.

Would you like me to book a 30‑minute appointment for you tomorrow at 10 AM?

arguments.title: Health Check‑up with Corporate Medical Team

arguments.message: Your health check‑up is scheduled for tomorrow at 10 AM in Wellness Center, Room 101. Please arrive 5 minutes early.

messages.content: All set! I've booked your health check‑up for tomorrow at 10 AM in Wellness Center, Room 101 and sent you a reminder notification. If you need to reschedule or want tips on lowering your resting heart rate in the meantime, just let me know.
